Name: Cyberpunch
About the game: Cyberpunch is a post apocalyptic beat em up game for 1-4 players. The fast-paced action is peppered with a variety of unique characters and enemies with speeds, health and attacks of each character or enemy found at all levels generated by procedure or randomly. Cross Platform Multiplayer We worked hard to release cross-platform functionality, where you can play with your PC, or you can play with phone device, even multiplayer online with your friends. Controller Support This game has Full Controller Support.
